name: Zoya
info: A Sinner adept at Physical Output. Deals 5% more Damage, and another 5% more for enemies with broken Cores.
maniaIntensifyText: Deals 10% more Damage, and another 10% more for enemies with broken Cores.
criminalRecord:
The leader of Syndicate's largest violent gang //West District Legion//. Allegedly involved in over a dozen crimes including armed confrontation, arms trade, assault, etc. Took over and eliminated other gangs by illegal means and incited a new wave of unrest within Syndicate, escalating the violent conflicts in Syndicate within a short time and causing serious casualties across a wide area.

The subject's use of her power to subvert Syndicate's order severely disrupted the West District's Public Security Bureau's management. The subject crossed the line and Public Security Bureau of the the West District requested and sent multiple requests to FAC to eliminate Zoya.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
The epitome of pure physical strengthening, the subject possesses shocking power. Combined with the excellent fighting skills gained from years of training, the subject's unarmed fighting ability has pushed beyond the recorded limits of human beings.

+++* Awakening Signs
Investigation shows that the subject ambushed a gang hideout alone many years ago and was injured by a heavy mania weapon. The infection awakened the subject to her special powers and she gained control over it in no time, singlehandedly butchering the enemies at the hideout.

+++* Corruption State
Possesses impressive adaptability to one's special power, resisting almost all possible side effects the Mania can cause. No matter what tests or stimulation are applied, no signs of mutation can be detected. The subject's mental and physical conditions both remain exceptionally stable.
ecbFlavourText:
"Bro, who is that woman? She looks powerful."
"She is the future leader of our Legion."
servingTerm1: No one had believed the Legion's leader would turn herself in to the MBCC, so Zoya's appearance caused quite a stir. Due to the large number of her admirers, Zoya has immense influence and appeal. This requires close attention by the Bureau.
servingTerm2: The subject occupied a communal hangar without approval, modified it into a //head office// with the personal signature purple and black color tones, and stored a large volume of common arms from unknown sources. Since no staff dared to stop her, the MBCC decided to turn a blind eye to this.
servingTerm3: Despite being revered by all Sinners with common sense, the subject never tries to put on airs in everyday life and treats everyone as comrades, teaching them fighting techniques personally. Certain Sinners are deeply touched by this and have even expressed their wish to join the //West District Legion//.
servingTerm4: The subject probably started saying //Chief// half-jokingly out of condescending humor, but she now uses the title out of genuine respect for a friend. Apparently, after spending much time together, there have been some changes in the subject's attitude toward the MBCC and the Chief.
emotionCheck1:
[Zoya seems to be upset.]

**Zoya:** Why is there no alcohol? Huh?

**Chief:** â€¦â€¦

* **Prompt:** Rules are rules. Don't ask any questions.
 * **Zoya:** Are you... provoking me?
 * **Zoya:** ğŸ˜

* **Prompt:** It's to prevent some people from getting drunk and acting crazy.
 * **Zoya:** Have you no idea how much I can drink before I get drunk? Go fetch me a bottle.
 * **Zoya:** ğŸ˜–
emotionCheck2:
[Zoya stretches her body and walks into your office.]

**Zoya:** You seem to have nothing else better do to. What do you say that we practice a little bit?

**Chief:** â€¦â€¦

* **Prompt:** Youâ€™ll control your strength, wonâ€™t you?
 * **Zoya:** Of course. I wonâ€™t go too far.
 * **Zoya:** ğŸ˜¦

* **Prompt:** I think it will be more effective if I practice with the other Sinners.
 * **Zoya:** Tsk. So boring.
 * **Zoya:** ğŸ˜¥
supervision1:
++* âš  Complaint Tickets

//Faye hands over a pile of complaint tickets to you.//

**System Notifications:** Several employees complained that Zoya often bosses around a group of younger Sinners and makes them use transport carts to race each other. This greatly disturbs public order.

* **Prompt:** Set up a special racing area
supervision2:
++* âš  Ink Meter

//The logistics department gave you dozens of black ink orders.//

**System Notifications:** An employee responsible for the stationery department said that the Sinners have been requesting black ink more frequently than usual. Later, you discovered that it was Zoya's [[[Horo |little sidekick]]] who wanted to use the black ink to dye the prison uniform for Zoya to wear.

* **Prompt:** Let Zoya bring her to do the laundry together.
supervision3:
++* âš  Maintenance Bill

//The Chief received a maintenance bill. It is no small amount.//

**System Notifications:** One day, two loud noises came from the Bureau. Shortly after that, two bills showed up on Chief's desk. The bills were for repairing the ceiling, one for Zoya's room and one for [[[Ninety-Nine |Ninety-Nineâ€™s]]].

* **Prompt:** Tearfully signs it
supervision4:
++* âš âš  Banner

//The Supervision Center detected that a Sinner left their area.//

**System Notifications:** Warning. A Sinner is trying to leave the MBCC's area.

* **Prompt:** Check surveillance

**System Notifications:** You switched between and checked multiple surveillance feeds, eventually finding out that the "escapee Sinner" was on the MBCC building's rooftop.

**Zoya:** Huh? I haven't left the MBCC. This doesn't count as a prison break, does it?

**Zoya:** I didn't expect that not only the people but also the machines in the MBCC would be so sensitive.

* **Prompt:** That isn't the reason behind it...

**Chief:** It is a bit inappropriate to climb to the rooftop for no reason.

**Zoya:** ...The banner flying here on the rooftop looks ugly.

* **Prompt:** Express doubt

**Zoya:** What I am saying is that I will be coming up here to replace it with some "interesting" banners in the future.
supervision5:
++* âš âš  Fierce Modification

//The Chief received quite a lot of complaint tickets.//

**System Notifications:** You went into your office and found several complaint tickets on your desk. They are basically from the Sinners and employees living near the Depot complaining about the loud noises.

**System Notifications:** So, you decided to head to the Depot and see what is happening there.

**Zoya:** Good. You are doing it. Don't worry about the people and the obstacles on your path.

**Zoya:** Just charge all the way until the end!

* **Prompt:** Intervene

**Chief:** What are you doing?!

**Zoya:** Oh? If it isn't the MBCC's Chief.

**Zoya:** The Depot couldn't handle the transport demand because the carts were slow with a small capacity. So, I took the liberty to modify them.

* **Prompt:** You sure know a lot of things...

**Zoya:** Ha. The Legion was once a convoy. This is all too easy for me.

* **Prompt:** Mock her

**Chief:** ...You do have awesome skills. But I'd say it's probably not a good idea to modify the carts and turn them into the Legion's racecars...

**Zoya:** That's no fun. Any vehicle should have the power to crush everything that stands in its way!
supervision6:
++* âš âš  Signature

//Since an open-air cafeteria was added in the Outdoor Activity Area, this place has been noisy. Today, people are experiencing as high as 80 decibels of noise.//

**System Notifications:** You hear noises from the cafeteria. Younger Sinners surround Zoya as Horo tries to maintain order next to them.

**Horo:** Stand in line! You only get three signatures today!

* **Prompt:** What is this?

**Zoya:** I don't know what to do with these people. They insist that I sign their tableware.

**Horo:** Using tableware with your signature on it will surely make us just as great as you are!

* **Prompt:** I didn't expect that would work...

**Zoya:** Since Horo has asked and I happen to be available, I think I'll grant them their wish.

**Zoya:** What...? Chief, why are you looking at me like that? Do you want one as well?

* **Prompt:** I'll pass.

**Zoya:** That's what I thought. You put the shackles on me. That's pretty much the same as owning me entirely... You don't need a signature from me.
supervision7:
++* âš âš âš  Arm Wrestling

//Someone is hosting an arm wrestling contest in the Recreation Area.//

**System Notifications:** Someone is holding an arm wrestling contest in the Recreation Area, and Zoya is leading by a wide margin.

**Zoya:** Chief? Are you interested too? Wanna have a go?

* **Prompt:** Refuse
 * **Zoya:** Hmm, no worries. Stamina has never been your strength.
 * **Zoya:** Just stand there and watch us.
 * **System Notifications:** With you cheering her on, Zoya wins first place.

* **Prompt:** Agree
 * **System Notifications:** You sit down at the table and grip Zoya's hand to issue a challenge!
 * **Zoya:** Ha, you actually have a little more strength than I imagined. But that's about it.
 * **Zoya:** See, if I go a little harder, you can't hold out.
 * **Zoya:** Wanna try with two hands? That will make a fairer match.

 * **Prompt:** Refuse
 * **System Notifications:** You insist on challenging Zoya with a single hand. And of course, you lose.
 * **Zoya:** You lost, but you have good sportsmanship, which is great.

* **Prompt:** Agree
 * **System Notifications:** You decide to challenge Zoya with two hands. Otherwise, you won't stand a chance.
 * **Zoya:** Two hands indeed make it more challenging... but it's still not enough.
 * **Zoya:** Come on, let me end it.
 * **System Notifications:** Zoya presses your hand onto the table slowly.

 * **Prompt:** Not use the shackles
 * **System Notifications:** Though you know you're going to lose, you decide against using the shackles.
 * **Zoya:** It's already not bad for you.
 * **System Notifications:** You hear applause of encouragement around you.

* **Prompt:** Use the shackles
 * **System Notifications:** You know you're going to lose and the shackles are your only means to victory.
 * **Zoya:** Humph, you're even using the shackles. But I'm not going to lose.
 * **System Notifications:** Zoya resists the shackles with all her strength while bending your wrist.
 * **Zoya:** Ha! I won! It's been a while since I last had such a satisfying match!
 * **Zoya:** One more round? What do you say?
 * **Chief:** I'm already exhausted...
baseVoicelines: [Obtain the Sinner] Sending out so many cops just to catch a Syndican gangster. Your subordinates are honestly... beyond useless. [Raise to Phase 1] It's not enough to simply possess power. You must also put it to good use. [Raise to Phase 3] What do they say, that these are humanity's limits? What a joke. Humans will never stop pushing beyond their limits. [Level Start] I've been waiting for so long. [Win Battles] You messed with the wrong person. [Lose Battles] This is not the end. Don't give in! [Ultimate Skill] I, am the Legion! [Die in Battles] I can't...go down like this... [Greeting] Hey, looks like you're free. How about taking a trip to the Syndicate with me? Quite a few people are eager to meet you. [Conversation 1] Your boss keeps switching my guards. Are they really so scared? Scared of an imprisoned Sinner, or a mediocre Syndican gangster? [Conversation 2] My subordinates are not just obsessed with muscles, they adore the brainy type too. Hmm... You seem qualified. Quit working for the government and join the Legion! [Conversation 3] Guns? We don't rely on them in fights. A warrior trusts only their fists and their will. What's more, Syndicate's guns have long been tainted. [Special Conversation 1] Only violence can end violence. That's the only answer Syndicate has given us. Those who once had dreams have all died for nothing. [Special Conversation 2] Those abandoned factories are remnants of the city's golden era. That's the glory Syndicans must reclaim. [Special Conversation 3] "No matter who they've lost, the Legion's commander must remain calm." But if something happened to you, I can't imagine what I would do... [Full Compliance] When we first met, you were just a rookie I could easily lift with a single arm. It surprises me... how you haven't changed a bit. But you're also the strongest I've ever met. I'll keep counting on you in the future, Chief. [Idle] It does look like there are a few people here... I can have a bout with. [Annoyed] Are you... provoking me? [Special Attention] Are you going to just watch? Why don't we have a bout instead? I'll stand there without moving, and I won't even use my hands. [Dispatch] A piece of cake. My guys in the Legion will get it done in no time. [Dispatch Complete] See? Told you it was easy. [Level Up] Hmmm... That's not enough. [Pat Head] Wow, you're pretty brave...
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
Tell those gangs that the Legion is hereâ€”â€”to declare war on all of you!

[Greeting]
Ha, you're late. Keep up. Didn't you say you want to witness the reformation of Syndicate? Stay with me at all times.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Who will be our first opponent? Ted? Yagyu? Why don't they all come at once? It will be the same.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
I'll leave the planning to Earl. I just need to open the way aheadâ€”â€”which is what he needs most.

[Ordinary Contact 3]
Rust, smoke, and endless violence. Syndicate never changes, I'm sick of it... Go. Destroy everything. It's time for a change.

[Ordinary Contact 4]
The Legion doesn't need a stronghold. The whole of Syndicate is the territory of the wolves.

[Idle] 
We have more enemies than this, but as long as those guys in the gutter dare to show up...

[Special Attention] 
Oh? Have you finally decided to join the Legion?

[Level Up}
Humph. I look forward to the battle.

[Pat Head]
I feel like you've... got a lot more guts lately.
attireVoicelines2:
[Attire Obtained]
As you can see, the negotiation was a huge success.

[Greeting]
You came. Unfortunately, the negotiation has ended prematurely. This place looks quite impressive, doesn't it? As good a place for conversation as any.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Hehe, to tame a beast, you must become more ferocious and savage than them.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
The future of Syndicate? Sigh, I don't have the answer to that yet, but I will find it, in my own way.

[Ordinary Contact 3]
Do you envy them? I can tell that you do by the look in your eyes.

[Ordinary Contact 4]
The fire of violence has died, but the embers remain in our heart, smoldering in every dark corner and waiting to be reignited.

[Idle] 
You did a great job guarding this place. Good doggy.

[Special Attention] 
This outfit is not bad for a negotiation meeting, but I'm not going to move as freely in this if things get physical... Sigh... Well, it's a nice gift from you guys, after all.

[Level Up}
Your words carry weight only when you have the power.

[Pat Head]
Your bravery never ceases to amaze.
nightmareTalent: For every Sinner in the exploration team, all allied units gain a 3% damage boost.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Hey, Ymir
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: While [Legion's Arrival] is activated, Zoya gains 30% / 35% / 40% additional Damage Reduction, and becomes immune to all negative effects.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"Bro, who is that woman? She looks powerful."
"She is the future leader of our Legion."

maniaIntensify.title: Conquer the Enemey
maniaIntensify.text: Deals 10% more damage, and another 10% more for enemies with broken Cores.

guide.title: Summary
guide.text: Zoya although the face of the game, is unfortunately one of the least useful S-rank characters in the game. Her damage is underwhelming and she does not provide utility for teammates either, even at high Shackles.

guide.title: ECB
guide.text: Zoya's ECB is optional to upgrade as it does not provide her any offensive benefit, only making her more tanky and debuff immune during Ult.

crimebrandSets.name: Embrace of the Dead
crimebrandSets.note: Deal increased damage to enemies that are corebroken.

crimebrandSets.name: Imaginary Gambit
crimebrandSets.note: When your movement count is an odd number, Zoya deals increased damage. When your movement count is even, Zoya is healed. Nice flexible comfort set that provides offensive and survival utility.

crimebrandSets.name: Tuning + City + Pioneer
crimebrandSets.note: Provides HP, Atk, and Damage Up.

crimebrandSets.name: Tower + Inversion
crimebrandSets.note: Gives Zoya some Crit Rate and Crit Damage for her NAs and generates energy to help you afford Zoya's expensive Ult. Probably better value equipped on a different character.

shackles.title: All-out
shackles.description: [Legion's Arrival] duration is extended by 5 seconds.

shackles.title: Head-to-head
shackles.description: Zoya gets 20% increase in Damage when there's only 1 enemy within her cross area.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 5 points.

skills.name: Assault
skills.description: Zoya punches and kicks nimbly, dealing (Attack*83%) Physical Damage each time.

skills.name: Legion's Arrival
skills.description: Zoya goes all out, dealing (500% of her Attack) Physical Damage to a 3x3 square around her, temporarily terrifying all enemies in the range and gaining [Legion's Arrival]. [Legion's Arrival]: Switching the fighting strategy, increasing the number of hits and Normal Attack damage coefficient at the expense of some Attack Speed. Lasts for 15 seconds, during which Zoya can't automatically recover her energy.

upgrade.description:
Burst damage is increased to $0%.
The damage of [Legion's Arrival] $0st and $0nd normal attack increases to $0%.
The damage of [Legion's Arrival] $0rd normal attack increases to $0%.

skills.name: Extreme Violence
skills.description: Every third attack deals an extra (2% of the target's HP) True Damage. (The damage dealt will not exceed 30% of Zoya's Attack)

skills.name: Fiery Invasion
skills.description: Zoya's Attack Speed increases by 1% each time she attacks the same enemy. The effect can stack up to 15 times.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Attack +5, Life +69
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Attack +5, Health +69, Unlock Requirements: Dispatch Zoya 10 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3 Unlock Requirements: Replace Zoya - Upgrade to Outdoor Supervision Object
Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, the title of Wild Wolf's Shackle
supervision8:
++* âš âš âš  Public Space

//You received a request from a detention area employee.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: You received a request from a detention area employee.

* **Prompt:** Confirm

**Staff:** Chief, you remember that Zoya who occupied a detention area's public lounge, right?

**Staff:** She kept her personal belongings in there. But now, her guns, cannons, and bombs are stacked in the hallway, blocking the way into the tool room. This is outrageous.

**Staff:** Could you talk to her for me?

**Staff:** She is making it difficult for us to carry out our routine cleaning duty...

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: The surveillance footage is over. Would you like to call for Zoya the Sinner?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**Zoya:** Chief?

* **Prompt:** Ask

**Chief:** The armaments stacked in the hallway outside the detention area's public lounge... Are they yours?

**Zoya:** The detention area's public lounge... Oh, you mean my "headquarters"?

**Zoya:** Those are mine, yes. I was cleaning my room. And I thought I'd dispose of a batch of not-so-useful weapons, so I put them in the hallway for now before I get rid of them.

* **Prompt:** Make your point politely
 * **Chief:** That is public space. Stacking weapons in the hallway can make people nervous. And this is causing people trouble in living their lives and doing their jobs.
 * **Zoya:** Will do.

* **Prompt:** Intervene impertinently
 * **Chief:** You need to get rid of those things right away, or I'll put you in disciplinary confinement.
 * **Zoya:** Huh. I don't need people to tell me what to do.
* **Prompt:** Warn
 * **Chief:** That's enough from you. It was already a severe violation when you occupied the lounge and put your armaments there.
 * **Zoya:** Heh...
